import React from "react"; import ArmAngle from "./ArmAnglePlot.png"; import PitchMovementPlot from "./PitchMovementPlot.png"; export const FeatureEngineering = () => { return (
Data and Features

Our primary focus was to include variables that the pitcher can reliably and consistently control:

  • Pitch velocity
  • Horizontal and Vertical Movement
  • Arm Angle
  • Spin Rate
  • Release Extension
  • Spin Axis
  • Velocity difference relative to primary fastball
  • Horizontal and Vertical movement relative to primary fastball
{/* Looking at the plot, we can see that there is roughly an equal amount of pitches thrown with each arm slot, balanced across both left and right handed pitchers This means that during model training, we will not inadvertently value one arm angle over the other due to how often it appears in the dataset compared to another arm angle */}
); };
